translations.text: I do swear by the Day of Judgment!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And I do swear by the self-reproaching soul!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Do people think We cannot reassemble their bones?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلَىٰ قَـٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّىَ بَنَانَهُۥ

translations.text: Yes ˹indeed˺! We are ˹most˺ capable of restoring ˹even˺ their very fingertips.<sup foot_note=77569>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Still people want to deny what is yet to come,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: asking ˹mockingly˺, “When is this Day of Judgment?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But when the sight is stunned,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the sun and the moon are brought together,<sup foot_note=77570>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: on that Day one will cry, “Where is the escape?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But no! There will be no refuge.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: On that Day all will end up before your Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُنَبَّؤُا۟ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

translations.text: All will then be informed of what they have sent forth and left behind.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: In fact, people will testify against their own souls,<sup foot_note=77571>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: despite the excuses they come up with.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

translations.text: Do not rush your tongue trying to memorize ˹a revelation of˺ the Quran.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: It is certainly upon Us to ˹make you˺ memorize and recite it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So once We have recited a revelation ˹through Gabriel˺, follow its recitation ˹closely˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Then it is surely upon Us to make it clear ˹to you˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But no! In fact, you love this fleeting world,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: anticipating something devastating to befall them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But no! ˹Beware of the day˺ when the soul reaches the collar bone ˹as it leaves˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and it will be said, “Is there any healer ˹who can save this life˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And the dying person realizes it is ˹their˺ time to depart,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and ˹then˺ their feet are tied together ˹in a shroud˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: On that day they will be driven to your Lord ˹alone˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: This denier neither believed nor prayed,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: but persisted in denial and turned away,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: then went to their own people, walking boastfully.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Woe to you, and more woe!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Again, woe to you, and even more woe!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Do people think they will be left without purpose?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِىٍّ يُمْنَىٰ

translations.text: Were they not ˹once˺ a sperm-drop emitted?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alam yaku nutfatan min manayyin yumna
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then they became a clinging clot,<sup foot_note=77572>1</sup> then He developed and perfected their form,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: producing from it both sexes, male and female.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحْـِۧىَ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ

translations.text: Is such ˹a Creator˺ unable to bring the dead back to life?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alaysa thalika biqadirin AAalaan yuhyiya almawta
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
